title: Lucas congruences using modular forms
authors: Frits Beukers, Wei-Lun Tsai, Dongxi Ye
abstract:
In this work, we prove that a sequence arising from modular forms under some
prescribed conditions for $\Gamma$ that is $\Gamma_{0}(N)$ or an Atkin--Lehner
extension of $\Gamma_{0}(N)$ must satisfy the Lucas congruences modulo any
prime. As an implication, we completely affirm all the conjectural Lucas
congruences that were recently posed by Cooper and reinterpret a number of
known results.
